scenes.one_liner: Ela guards a radio tent on a deserted highway under eerie moonlight.
Ela deciphers urgent radio distress coordinates amid tense static inside tent.
Marcus struggles inside a damaged spacecraft, urgently rebooting communications.
Sheriff Miller drives determinedly toward crash site along Desolation Road.
Sheriff and Ela rescue injured Marcus at crash site under spotlight.
Ela and Sheriff reflect peacefully on night’s events as dawn breaks.
